name: RequireJS
description: RequireJS is a JavaScript file and module loader. It is optimized for in-browser use, but it can be used in other JavaScript environments, like Rhino and Node. Using a modular script loader like RequireJS will improve the speed and quality of your code.

name: Moment.js
description: Parse, validate, manipulate, and display dates in JavaScript.

name: jPlayer
description: HTML5 Audio & Video for jQuery. The CSS styleable jQuery media player plugin with HTML5 support!

name: Toolbar.js
description: jQuery plugin to create tooltip style toobars

name: Hint.css
description: Hint.css is a tooltip library written in SASS which uses only HTML/CSS to create simple tooltips.

name: Sea.js
description: A Module Loader for the Web

name: Magnific Popup
description: Light and open source responsive lightbox plugin with focus on performance, for jQuery and Zepto.js. High-DPI (retina) display support, fast tap for touch devices.

name: Underscore.js
description: Underscore is a JavaScript library that provides a whole mess of useful functional programming helpers without extending any built-in objects.

name: Underscore.js 中文文档
description: Underscore 是一个JavaScript实用库,提供了类似Prototype.js (或 Ruby)的一些功能,但是没有继承任何JavaScript内置对象。

name: FastClick
description: FastClick is a simple, easy-to-use library for eliminating the 300ms delay between a physical tap and the firing of a click event on mobile browsers.

name: Turn.js
description: Turn.js makes a beautiful page turning effect using HTML5 and jQuery

name: jQuery.AjaxFileUpload.js
description: jQuery plugin to magically make file inputs upload via ajax

name: FlexPaper
description: The web pdf viewer solution.

name: Passport
description: Simple, unobtrusive authentication for Node.js.

name: Chance.js
description: Utility library to generate anything random for JavaScript

name: lodash
description: A JavaScript utility library delivering consistency, modularity, performance, & extras.

name: Hammer.JS
description: Add multi-touch gestures to your webpage.

name: zTree
description: zTree 是一个依靠 jQuery 实现的多功能 “树插件”。优异的性能、灵活的配置、多种功能的组合是 zTree 最大优点。专门适合项目开发，尤其是 树状菜单、树状数据的Web显示、权限管理等等。zTree 是开源免费的软件（MIT 许可证）。在开源的作用下，zTree 越来越完善，目前已经拥有了不少粉丝，并且今后还会推出更多的 zTree 扩展功能库，让 zTree 更加强大。

name: ui-tinymce
description: AngularUI wrapper for TinyMCE

name: angular-breadcrumb
description: Angular-breadcrumb is a module for AngularJS, which generates a breadcrumb for any page of your application. It is strongly based on the ui-router framework and its hierarchical tree of states.

name: Intro.js
description: Intro.js - Better introductions for websites and features with a step-by-step guide for your projects.

name: angular-intro.js
description: AngularJS directives for intro.js

name: angular-notifications
description: An AngularJS component for easily creating notifications. Can also use HTML5 notifications.

name: Uploadify
description: HTML5 File Upload Script, jQuery Multiple File Upload Plugin

name: floatlabels.js
description: Follows the famous Float Label Pattern. A Plugin built on jQuery.

name: D3.js - Data-Driven Documents
description: D3 is a JavaScript library for visualizing data with HTML, SVG, and CSS.

name: autoprefixer
description: PostCSS plugin to parse CSS and add vendor prefixes to CSS rules using values from Can I Use. It is recommended by Google and used in Twitter, and Taobao.

name: jsdoc
description: An API documentation generator for JavaScript.

name: gulp-minify-css
description: A Gulp plugin that minifies css with clean-css

name: gulp-sourcemaps
description: Source map support for Gulp.js

name: gulp-usemin
description: Replaces references to non-optimized scripts or stylesheets into a set of HTML files (or any templates/views).

name: gulp-rename
description: Rename files easily

name: gulp-htmlmin
description: gulp plugin to minify HTML.

name: gulp-angular-templatecache
description: Concatenates and registers AngularJS templates in the $templateCache.

name: JSLite
description: 与jQuery有着类似的api，让web开发更迅速，下载执行更快、量级更轻，针对现代高级浏览器的JavaScript库。

name: gulp-inject
description: A javascript, stylesheet and webcomponent injection plugin for Gulp

name: gulp-rev
description: Static asset revisioning by appending content hash to filenames: unicorn.css → unicorn-098f6bcd.css
